21-0399.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday,Page 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, MAY 11, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESApril 13, 2021.A motion was made by Commissioner Price, seconded by Commissioner Uranga, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Mungo and Hudson2.

21-0400.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for February 2021.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Vice Chair Saro, seconded by Commissioner Price, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasAbsent: 2 - Mungo and Hudson3.

21-0401.summary: Recommendation to adopt Specifications No. RFP HE20-045 and award a contract to BDO PHA Finance, of Philadelphia, PA, for providing accounting services for the Long Beach Housing Authority, in a total amount not to exceed $600,000, for a period of three years, with the option to renew for three additional one-year periods, at the discretion of the Housing Authority; and authorize Executive Director of the Housing Authority, or designee, to execute all documents necessary to enter into the contract, including any necessary amendments.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Vice Chair Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasPage 2 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, MAY 11, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESAbsent: 1 - Hudson4.
